nodes.text: Dractuvian caveworms were six-legged tubular creatures with sharp teeth. They lived in the caves of Dractu and were very similar to Dractuvian cave slugs, but were more aggressive and dangerous. One of them attached itself to Dexter Jettster, who could not remove it without the assistance of a native Dractuvian.
Later, In adulthood, they will grow there legs longer, and act most likely like an Acklay.
